revised_title: A Catalogue of Principal Fixed Stars in the Southern Hemisphere
tldr: The author, Fearon Fallows, presents a catalogue of nearly all the principal fixed stars in the southern hemisphere, from the zenith of Cape Town to the South Pole, based on observations made during 1822 and the beginning of 1823. The catalogue includes a description of the instruments used, the methods employed for insuring accuracy, and the process of determining the right ascensions and declinations of the stars.
